byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman and Amy Chozick contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Hillary Clinton campaign announces it will join Wisconsin recount effort launched by Green Party candidate Jill Stein as well as potential challenges to Pennsylvania and Michigan results; does not expect to reverse election but hopes to assure supporters that it is doing all it can.

keywords.value: Green Party of the United States
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The campaign also said it would participate in potential recounts in Pennsylvania and Michigan, though it saw no “actionable evidence” of vote hacking.
snippet: The campaign also said it would participate in potential recounts in Pennsylvania and Michigan, though it saw no “actionable evidence” of vote hacking....

headline.main: Hillary Clinton’s Team to Join Wisconsin Recount Pushed by Jill Stein
headline.print_headline: Clinton Team to Join Recount Effort Pushed by Green Party Candidate
